text: Ronald Finley (December 10, 1940 - July 5, 2016) was an American wrestler. He competed in the men's Greco-Roman featherweight at the 1964 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2016 deaths Category:American male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of the United States Category:Wrestlers at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:People from Huntington Park, California Category:Pan American Games medalists in wrestling Category:Pan American Games gold medalists for the United States Category:Wrestlers at the 1963 Pan American Games
title: Ronald Finley
